data.eml:eml: Revision of Campsurus violaceus species group (Ephemeroptera: Polymitarcyidae) with new synonymies and nomina dubia in Campsurus Eaton, 1868

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Molineri, C., Salles, F. F., Emmerich, D. (2015): Revision of Campsurus violaceus species group (Ephemeroptera: Polymitarcyidae) with new synonymies and nomina dubia in Campsurus Eaton, 1868. Zootaxa 3920 (1): 51-68, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3920.1.3
